column4: i keep getting this The file '/media/01CB7496B055A3B0/Program Files (x86)/World of Warcraft/Wow.exe' is not marked as executable.  and it wont let me right click > properties > permissions > Allow executing file as program. it just unchecks it self
are you using wine to run windows programs?
yes
right click it, and his "open with wine"
hit*

should i reboot?

update wine starn, or try using play on linux

I will look at taht right now

wine is already the newest version.
